text: Royal Air Force Desborough or more simply RAF Desborough is a former Royal Air Force airfield located in Northamptonshire, England The following units were here at some point: * No. 102 Flying Refresher School RAF * No. 108 Elementary Gliding School RAF * No. 108 Gliding School RAF * No. 84 Operational Training Unit RAF * No. 1381 (Transport) Conversion Unit RAF ==References== Category:Royal Air Force stations in Northamptonshire
title: RAF Desborough
